categories.name: Stage
categories.description: Actions for initializing events and programs

blocks.name: Stage Director
blocks.description: Listens to stage start and stop events, emitting an object when either event occurs.

blocks.name: Stage Parameter
blocks.description: JSON Object that can be sent by the stage director.

categories.name: Data Extraction
categories.description: Actions for extracting data from various sources, including web scraping and processing API responses to retrieve relevant information.

blocks.name: JSON Path
blocks.description: Extracts data from object based on given selectors.

blocks.name: Data Function
blocks.description: Transforms data by applying a specified function to each item in a dataset.

blocks.name: NW.js webview Tag
blocks.description: The <webview> opens a webpage in a separate process with different permissions from your app.

categories.name: Data Processing
categories.description: Tools for parsing, transforming, and manipulating data, particularly JSON, including operations such as mapping, filtering, and aggregation.

blocks.name: JSON Parse
blocks.description: Converts a JSON string into a JavaScript object for easier manipulation.

categories.name: Logging and Monitoring
categories.description: Functions for logging activities and monitoring performance within workflows, providing insights into operation success and failures.

blocks.name: Log Activity
blocks.description: Records specified activities or events for auditing and tracking purposes.

categories.name: Network Services
categories.description: Capabilities to make calls to local network services, including RESTful APIs and WebSocket connections for real-time data exchange.

blocks.name: JavaScript Fetch from Local Service
blocks.description: Retrieves data from a specified local service over the network.
